title: Adult Learner Mathematics Competency Strengthening Project in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics (Functions, Equations, Statistics, etc.) and Work-Related Data Interpretation Experience
context.additional_context: A customized mathematics learning environment for office/administrative professionals to solve practical workplace problems, considering smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical modeling skills with over 80% accuracy through project-based tasks in a blended learning environment.
Learners achieve over 90% self-directed learning participation within three months by establishing learning plans based on Self-Determination Theory.
Learners achieve an average score of 4.5 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in engagement surveys by employing situational interest strategies during PBL processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
